title: Australia's New North-West. Pt. 1: The Kimberley
brief_description: Part one of a two-part series, this film deals with agricultural and pastoral development in the Kimberley region. It illustrates the results of irrigation on pilot areas and also refers to the Flying Doctor Service, the School of the Air, and stock, crop and pasture improvement. Narrated by Roger Climpson.
